full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement: Dell Alienware PC's or Equivalent for RCMP

**Notice Title**

[English]

* Invitation to Tender: Dell Alienware PC's or Equivalent for RCMP

[English]
 
* Demande de soumission: Dell Alienware PC’s ou l’équivalent pour la GRC


## Tender Details

- **Solicitation No**.: BPM017519/20961
- **Publication Date**.: December 2, 2022
- **Closing Date**. December 16, 2022, 14:00 EST

## Procurement Overview
Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) requires Dell Alienware PC's or equivalent to support digital forensics investigation. The requirement includes 8 Dell Alienware Aurora R13 and 8 Dell Alienware X15 or their equivalents. The equipment shall be delivered to Westmount, Quebec within 60 federal working days from contract award.

## Tender Description

The tender is invited under an open-bidding process by the Shared Services Canada. The solicitation includes various attachments that can be accessed through the following link: [https://supplier-fournisseur-sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/usr/login](https://supplier-fournisseur-sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/usr/login). Interested suppliers may submit their bids electronically.

## Key Procurement Information

- **Supplier Contact Information**:
  - **Agent d’approvisionnement**: Sorn Prak, Shared Services Canada, 400 Cooper St, 6th floor, PO Box/CP 9808 STS T CSC, Ottawa, ON K2G 2N1
  - **Phone**: (613) 298-2073
  - **Email**: sorn.prak@ssc-spc.gc.ca

## Award Criteria
The responsive bid with the lowest evaluated price will be recommended for award of a contract.

Note: The original french text had some minor layout variations.  This reworked version was designed using consistent line spacing, consistent capitalization, and consistent punctuation. Also, multiple spaces were removed between sentences. There was no editorial value in relocating the text to a more "professional" rephrasing, but I was requested to rephrase and the Message rules explicitly discouraged using an overly elaborate or offensive language which was moved to a standardized Prose form. 
I would be happy to yield to my editor if the conduct changes the final results used appropriately. Best Reguards.
